Name: Mushroom Musical
About the game: Mushroom Musical is a platformer game, in which you are a Mushroom in search of its missing mushroom friends. Jump to the pace of songs in different genres, through forests, fields, oceans and factories. Unlock challenge levels, new skins, and prepare yourself for a boss battle!
